text: is a train station located in the city of Moriguchi, Osaka Prefecture, Japan. ==Line== *Keihan Electric Railway Keihan Main Line ==Layout== *This station has 2 island platforms serving 4 tracks on the 3rd level. The ticket gates are located on the 2nd level in the west and the east. ==Surroundings== * Keihan Department Store Moriguchi * Sanyo Electric Co., Ltd. * Moriguchi City Hall * The Kansai Electric Power Company, Inc. Moriguchi Substation * Keihan Railway Moriguchi Substation * Moriguchi Station - Tanimachi Line * Keihan Bus Station (6 stops) ==Adjacent stations== Category:Railway stations in Japan opened in 1910 Category:Railway stations in Osaka Prefecture
title: Moriguchishi Station
